name: Chandra's Embercat
originalText: {T}: Add {R}. Spend this mana only to cast an Elemental spell or a Chandra planeswalker spell.

rulings.text: A Chandra planeswalker spell is a planeswalker spell with the subtype Chandra. Cards that use Chandra’s name in their title or her likeness in their illustration (such as Chandra’s Regulator or Chandra’s Outrage) aren’t Chandra planeswalker spells.

text: {T}: Add {R}. Spend this mana only to cast an Elemental spell or a Chandra planeswalker spell.
